item.title: Incident Response: Phishing Email Investigation Cheatsheet
item.description: URLs *VirusTotal - will give a reputation. Google Safe Browsing - will tell if it’s on a blacklist urlscan - best and quickest, it will flag if they are active phishing, will give a screenshot, and has an awesome API. (NOTE) If you detect any as malicious, block them on your firewalls and do a search across your logs. CheckPhish PhishCheck DNSDumpster *Hybrid Analysis *any.run URLhaus JOE Sandbox *Can scan files
